Cowgirl in Jubilife School. Save BEFORE getting egg as it MUST hatch into Mantyke!! The Dex count will be higher at the end of this section with others, however they are all available before Mantyke by catching, therefore without Mantyke your Dex count will be lower in later portions.

Items/Events: Make sure to get a Dragon Scale here. Horsea has a 5% chance to hold one, although you can steal it by using Covet instead of having to catch them all. Covet can be learned by Eevee and your Zigzagoons at a low level. Credit to Hannerups on Reddit for making me aware of this.

Notes: MORNING/DAY ONLY                  Catch a few to account for variable random evolution.
Not required but avoids Budew friendship Evo.

Items/Events: Rival battle on entry to route. Win to get Exp. Share.

Notes: Only knows Teleport so it WILL flee if not caught immediately
Items/Events: Soothe Bell north of Lake, helps with friendship Evos.

Talk to Steven Stone in house by Oreburgh Mine
Trade 1 of the Ponyta from Route 207

Items/Events: Roark gives an Evo. Stone. It doesn't matter which you choose however the later portion of this guide is written asuming you chose the Water Stone.

Now to train and evolve all captures. You will need to have obtained at least 2 King's Rock through Pickup with your Zigzagoons, it can be found between levels 11-30. If any of them are still below level 21 then train these first with your other Pokemon holding the Exp. Share. At Level 21 you will Begin to find Rare Candies. You will also need to get at least 1 to Level 51 as this is when you begin to find Dawn Stone's for evolving Kirlia into Gallade. Also, only evolve one Wurmple at first. After seeing its evolution, save the game and use Rare Candies on the others until you find one with the other evolution. Once found, reset the game and evolve only that Wurmple. All possible evolutions are listed below, I reccomend using Route 207 for grinding.
Use Soothe Bell.
If you caught one without Pickup, use that.

MUST evolve both

Items/Events: Put a Clamperl in your party and talk to the man in the house next to the Poke Centre to get the Deep Sea Tooth and Deep Sea Scale.

Notes: Battle Interviewer in Poke Centre. If team gets full deposit pokemon and interact again to get the rest.

Items/Events: Receive Honey from salesman after beating Galactic Grunts. You'll need to return here throughout your playthrough to buy more.

Notes: Trade 1 of the Cherubi from Floaroma Meadow

Items/Events: Make sure to get a Metal Coat and an Electerizer here. Magnemite has a 5% chance to hold a Metal Coat, whilst Elekid has a 5% chance to hold an Electerizer. You can steal these by using Covet instead of having to catch them all. Covet can be learned by Eevee and your Zigzagoons at a low level. Credit to Baumhaus-a on Reddit for making me aware of this.
Get Oran Berry from berry plants. If you get more later, make sure you always keep hold of one.
Get Leaf Stone from Moss Rock.
Get Old Gateau in room left of entrance and back rightmost room. Make sure to keep hold of at least one for later.

Notes: In the room at the back with the glowing eyes. Interact with the painting and try to leave the room to encounter. SAVE BEFORE leaving the room as you can only do this once!!!
Interact with TV in back room to encounter.

Items/Events: Get Water Stone south of lake.

For now this area has no pokemon to obtain so I'll list all tasks like this. Firstly you'll want to go to the gate at the South of the city to obtain the TMs for False Swipe from the Assistant. Next there's a Sun Stone next to the Gym you'll want to grab. Following this go to the Underground Man's house. Here you'll get the Explorer Kit from the Underground Man, as well as one each of the fossils from the Female lab assistant. Once you have these, go back to Oreburgh City. The end of the Cycling Road is blocked for now so you'll have to go the long way.

Items/Events: Get Moon Stone.
Get Fire Stone.
Get Prism Scale.
Get Ice Stone by following top path.

Notes: Trade one of the Snorunt from Route 216, make sure to keep at least 1 Female.

Items/Events: Now that you have completed all captures, you'll need to go underground with the Explorer Kit to get Evolution Stones. These are the items you'll need to get from the underground; 2 Moon Stones, 3 Water Stones, 3 Leaf Stones and 1 Sun Stone. In addition you'll also need 2 Dusk Stones, you'll likely have gotten these from your Pickup Zigzagoon as it's obtained from Level 31. If you don't have them then you'll have to find them. I recommend using Route 205/211 or Mt. Coronet for grinding, whilst there are areas with higher level encounters or a higher Exp yield, this is the nearest within a reasonable distance of a Poke Centre.
If you didn't evolve the second Poliwag earlier, you'll need to do so now.
If you didn't evolve the second Oddish earlier, you'll need to do so now.
Obtained at Lv. 15 so will only need to gain 1 level.

Items/Events: Tangela learns Ancient Power at Lv. 34, it MUST learn it or it won't evolve.

Items/Events: Aipom learns Double Hit at Lv. 32, it MUST learn it or it won't evolve.

Items/Events: Yanma learns Ancient Power at Lv. 33, it MUST learn it or it won't evolve.

Notes: Interact with Pokeball after beating Jupiter.
Items/Events: You'll get a Dawn Stone from the Man in the Cycling Shop.

Notes: Received from Cynthia on the way to the Cycling Shop.

Items/Events: Get Thunder Stone.

Notes: Has Takedown so can K.O. itself.
Items/Events: Get Dusk Stone on main floor.
Get Dusk Stone from rock in basement next to first slope.

Notes: Go through basement to the furthest room. Save as soon as you enter the room before moving as this can only be done once. Take a step forward to encounter Gabite.
Items/Events: Get TM85 Dazzling Gleam from Mira when leaving.
Get Odd Keystone from the man by the Honey Tree.
No encounters here so just get the Shiny Stone from your Mom in the Contest Hall, as well as the Up-Grade from Bebe in the house next to the Poke Centre.

Method: Level up with Remoraid in the Party.
Items/Events: Now that you have completed all captures for this section, it's time for the evolutions. In case you're doing the evolutions in a different order than listed below, make sure to evolve Mantyke BEFORE Remoraid!!

Notes: Gift after finishing the story events in the Pokemon Mansion.
Items/Events: Get Lucky Egg from happiny in Pokemon Mansion.
Get Good Rod from Fisherman. This is not technically required as all encounters with the Good Rod can be done with the Old Rod, this just means they'll be at a higher level.

Notes: Interact with Broken Stone Tower with Odd Keystone in the bag. It has Curse so be careful.

Items/Events: There's no capture's here but you'll need to get the Reaper Cloth from the Scientist on the first floor.

No encounters here either, however you now have access to the Day Care. There's nothing to breed for now, but the man at the table will sell you the friendship boosting berries. Also, the Cowgirl in the side area will be where you'll want to grind for evolutions for now on as she has teams of Chansey/Blissey at various levels.
Get the Fire, Water and Thunder Stones from the side rooms.
Get Razor Fang.
Get Razor Claw.
No encounters here but you'll need to get the Dubious Disc from the man in the house behind the Poke Centre
Get a Sitrus Berry. If you get more, make sure to keep hold of one for later.

Notes: Talk to the Old Woman in the house south of the Poke Centre and listen to her story.
